stores.name: BORED â€“ Skateshop & Tee Emporium
stores.description: A tiny skateshop run by a kid named BORED. Posters everywhere. Graffiti art. Skateboard decks lean against walls. Smell of grip tape and teenage ennui.

interior.walls: Covered in band posters, graffiti, stickers.
interior.floor: Black paint, worn smooth. Probably skateboard wax.
interior.counter: Covered in merchandise. Hoodie racks. Tee piles.

stores.name: Milo's Discount Optics
stores.description: A small optician shop. Glass displays full of frames. Eye charts on walls. Milo behind the counter, looking overqualified and tired.

interior.walls: Soft blue. Motivational posters about vision.
interior.lighting: Harsh fluorescent. Shows every dust particle.

stores.name: Generic Store (Sign Unreadable)
stores.description: A store whose sign has faded completely. Interior is mostly empty. Whatever it sold is gone.

stores.name: Another Store (Also Unreadable)
stores.description: Shelves mostly empty. Whatever store this was, it's been gutted.

stores.name: The Anchor Store (Name Forgotten)
stores.description: A massive, half-dead department store. Mannequins stand frozen in the windows. Most lights are out. Echoes loudly. This is where retail comes to die.

interior.floor: Polished but scuffed. Different departments visible.
interior.lighting: Mostly dark. A few lights on.
interior.atmosphere: Eerie. Huge empty space. Echoes. Cold.

stores.name: Food Court
stores.description: The communal eating area. A handful of tables. A few scattered shops (teriyaki, pizza, something unidentifiable). Usually has 1-3 shoppers. Smells like every fast food brand and none of them.

interior.walls: Glass windows to mall. Orange tile.
interior.tables: Orange plastic. Some are still sticky.

stores.name: Service Corridor
stores.description: Back corridors. Utility fixtures. Vents. No customer should be here. But you can go here anyway.

interior.lighting: Harsh. All lights work here (for maintenance).
interior.sounds: Vents hum. Pipes rattle. Echoes carry weirdly.

stores.name: Escalators (Not Implemented)
stores.description: Escalators would connect to upper levels. For now, they're just aesthetic.

stores.name: Restroom
stores.description: The restroom entrance. Door is locked. You can smell chlorine and something else you don't want to think about.
